alt: Senator JD Vance speaks before former President Donald Trump at a campaign rally in Butler Pa. on October 5 2024. On July 13 2024 a gunman fired eight rounds at the former president and Republican presidential nominee during a rally in Butler. Trump was grazed by a bullet in the attack and Pennsylvania firefighter Corey Comperatore was killed as he tried to shield his family from the attack. Two other men were injured.
description: The image depicts a political event where a man is addressing a crowd. The man is dressed in a dark suit and tie, suggesting a formal or professional appearance. He is standing on a stage with a microphone, indicating that he is the speaker at this event. The crowd is composed of people of various ages and genders, all focused on the speaker. Some of the individuals in the crowd are holding up signs, which indicates that they are supporters of the speaker or the political party he represents. The setting appears to be outdoors, as there is natural light illuminating the scene. The overall atmosphere suggests a political rally or campaign event.
article_heading: I will never yield': Trump delivers defiant speech at site of his attempted assassination

alt: An American flag is suspended over a crowd of attendees at a Donald Trump campaign rally held Oct. 5 2024 in Butler Pa.
description: The image depicts an outdoor event with a large crowd of people gathered in an open area. The attendees are seated on chairs and standing, with many wearing red hats, suggesting a coordinated event or team spirit. In the background, there is a large American flag hanging from a crane, which is a common symbol of patriotism and national pride. The flag is prominently displayed, indicating a theme of American unity or celebration. There are also large banners with text on them, one of which reads "MAKE AMERICA GREAT AGAIN," which is a slogan associated with a political campaign. The presence of this slogan, along with the American flag, suggests that the event may be related to a political rally or a gathering of supporters for a political candidate. The setting appears to be a fairground or an outdoor venue with a stage, as there are speakers or performers visible on the stage. The sky is clear, indicating fair weather, which is typical for outdoor events. The overall atmosphere seems to be one of excitement and community engagement, with attendees participating in the event and showing their support.
article_heading: Trump rallies supporters in Butler where he survived an assassination attempt
